message: Starting env prep and repo scan to run service in simulation mode.
Env ready; service started in SIMULATION and ready. Inserting start_recipe and polling machines.status.
Observed start_recipe failures (missing recipe/operator, then unique_execution_state). Inserted stop_recipe; machine/state confirmed idle. Preparing final summary.
Runtime validation finished. Service ran in SIMULATION; start->processing failed due to DB constraints; stop->idle/state->idle confirmed; service stopped.
